regulation: The rules below define whether an order applies to a given coupon or not

code.title: Coupon code
code.helperText: Coupon code to which the customer will apply
code.label: Add code

description.title: Customize coupon message
description.helperText: Message to use when the customer applies the coupon
description.label: Add message

promotionText.helperText: Message to use in the description of the coupon to the customer

usage.subtitle: Allows you to define a maximum or range of quantity of uses from which the coupon will apply to the order

quantity_orders.subtitle: Allows you to define a maximum or range of quantity of orders from which the coupon will apply to the order

amount.subtitle: Allows you to define a maximum or range of amount from which the coupon will apply to the order

amountCategory.subtitle: Allows you to define a maximum or range of amount, by category, from which the coupon will apply to the order

product.subtitle: Allows you to select the product or products that could be added to the order under a certain coupon

category.subtitle: Allows you to define one or more categories to which a certain coupon can be applied

address.subtitle: Allows you to define one or more locations to which a certain coupon can be applied
